article.headline: Apple Inc. stock rises Friday, outperforms market
article.body: Shares of Apple Inc. AAPL, +1.74% advanced 1.74% to $116.97 Friday, on what proved to be an all-around positive trading session for the stock market, with the NASDAQ Composite Index COMP, +1.39% rising 1.39% to 11,579.94 and the Dow Jones Industrial Average DJIA, +0.56% rising 0.57% to 28,586.90. Apple Inc. closed $21.01 short of its 52-week high ($137.98), which the company achieved on September 2nd. The stock demonstrated a mixed performance when compared to some of its competitors Friday, as Microsoft Corp. MSFT, +2.48% rose 2.48% to $215.81, Alphabet Inc. Cl A GOOGL, +1.82% rose 1.82% to $1,510.45, and International Business Machines Corp. IBM, -2.81% fell 2.81% to $127.79. Trading volume (98.6 M) remained 82.2 million below its 50-day average volume of 180.8 M. Editor's Note: This story was auto-generated by Automated Insights using data from Dow Jones and FactSet. See our market data terms of use.
